snippet: Two explosions struck an area that had been considered relatively safe from the intense Israeli bombing campaign.
abstract: Israeli airstrikes kill four Palestinian boys playing on Gaza beach; Israel's military acknowledges that it is responsible for 'tragic outcome' and says attack was aimed at Hamas; four dead boys symbolize how Israeli aerial assaults in Gaza are killing innocents; running count kept by United Nations shows civilians make up about 75 percent of Palestinians killed in Israeli airstrikes.

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Fares Akram in Gaza, Jodi Rudoren and Gaby Sobelman in Jerusalem, and Hwaida Saad in Beirut, Lebanon.

lead_paragraph: Two explosions struck an area that had been considered relatively safe from the intense Israeli bombing campaign.

headline.main: Boys Drawn to Gaza Beach, and Into Center of Mideast Strife
headline.print_headline: Boys Drawn to Gaza Beach, and Into Center of Mideast Strife
